title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 150.16 - Revocation of permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 150.16 - Revocation of permits

State Regulations

Any validly existing permits which were issued under the
provisions of former Part 150, or previous number Part 36, are hereby revoked. Any such sign which would qualify for registration under section
150.15
of this Part may be so
registered. If any such sign is nonconforming and is a compensable sign under
the provisions of the outdoor advertising control statutes or this Part should
be registered under the provisions of section
150.15
in order for such sign to
be identified as a nonconforming, compensable sign. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
150.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
